message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $9,500.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still looking for a bit more. How about $9,750? It's a fair price considering the value of the product for both of us.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $9,600.
